definition: variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]

sentences.english: And then there was the steel.
Steel making in the open-hearth furnace is a very slow process, much slower than the Bessemer one.
sentences.chinese: 平炉炼钢是一个很慢的过程，比转炉炼钢慢得多。

sentences.english: Steel making in the open-hearth furnace is a very slow process, much slower than the Bessemer one.
sentences.chinese: 平炉炼钢是一个很慢的过程，比转炉炼钢慢得多。

sentences.english: The abrasive grit we get is prime material for electric steelmaking and converter.
sentences.chinese: 这种铁粒可作为转炉和电炉炼钢的优质原料。

sentences.english: Steelmaking has been a high consumption rough-oriented industry.
sentences.chinese: 一直以来，炼钢都是一种高消耗的粗犷型工业。

sentences.english: The Shijingshan Iron Smeltery, founded in 1919, predecessor of the Shoudu Iron and Steel Co.
sentences.chinese: 首钢的前身是石景山炼钢厂，创立于1919年。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the stopper auto control system of Conti.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了炼钢厂连铸生产中的塞棒自动控制系统。

sentences.english: The converter sludges come out of the dedusting system during the production of steel making.
sentences.chinese: 转炉烟尘是炼钢生产过程中排出的含铁粉尘。

sentences.english: The operation of bubbly slag submerged - arc is a new technology of electric arc furnace smelt.
sentences.chinese: 泡沫渣埋弧操作是电弧炉炼钢的一项新技术。

sentences.english: Two new steelworks are being planned .
sentences.chinese: 这家炼钢厂正在建设中。

sentences.english: The process of steelmaking with hot metal containing low silicon in Steelmaking Plant was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 简介了川威炼钢厂低硅铁水冶炼工艺。

sentences.english: Modification of the Bessemer process for converting pig iron into steel.
sentences.chinese: 修正柏塞麦炼钢法将生铁炼成钢的一种方法。

sentences.english: This is also used in steelmaking and so on.
sentences.chinese: 对于炼钢等来说也一样。

sentences.english: The author has recently visited the Second Steel Plant of Anyang Iron and Steel Co.
sentences.chinese: 作者对安阳钢铁公司第二炼钢厂进行了考察。

sentences.english: It is used for refractory material and steel industry according to different property.
sentences.chinese: 根据不同的性能，可用于耐火材料和炼钢造渣剂用等。

sentences.english: The principal commodity of the Brisbane business unit is metallurgical coal for use in steel making.
sentences.chinese: 布里斯班公司的主要商品为炼钢用的炼焦煤。

definition: coking/the process of producing coke from coal
a blast furnace (in modern times)/a draft assisted furnace for smelting metals
to roll steel (into sheets or bars)
